snippet: GORDON--Adrienne L. To a wonderful woman who was like a grandmother to us. You will be in our hearts forever. Jared, Rachel, Ilan, Pamela, Sidney, Asha and Quinn. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GORDON--Adrienne L. To a wonderful woman who was like a grandmother to us. You will be in our hearts forever. Jared, Rachel, Ilan, Pamela, Sidney, Asha and Quinn. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GORDON, ADRIENNE L
